website_summaries.verdict: A budget-priced dive flashlight that is very basic in design and offers high, low, and strobe settings.
pros: The BlueFire dive light comes with a convenient Velcro strap that allows you to attach the unit to your wrist for hands-free operation
This model is designed to be waterproof up to a depth of 25 m
cons: The twisting motion used to turn the light on and off is a troublesome design that can lead to flooding or the light turning itself on unexpectedly

customer_reviews.title: Great light intensity
customer_reviews.text: The three flash modes are still great, although they are often used only in the normally open mode, but feel great.The intensity of the flashlight's light is satisfactory and its brightness is sufficient for use.The surface of the sea clearly illuminates the bottom of the sea.I like the quietness of the sea floor and the beautiful scenery
customer_reviews.author: Anneka

customer_reviews.title: Flashlights are very bright and last a long time
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight has sufficient luminosity and long endurance, which is very satisfying. It's so small, it's so portable, and it's so bright. Cost performance is very high, the quality is very good, open to see the internal work is very fine, the brightness is enough! It's ready for use. It's bright and powerful. The next time you come, the logistics will be quick. A bargain!

customer_reviews.title: Strong exposure, easy to use, long-lasting power
customer_reviews.text: Summer is coming soon. Every summer, we dive into the sea. The diving flashlight is definitely indispensable. This product does not enter the water 30 meters underwater. It is very good. The brightness is also very high. The operation is simple and not cumbersome. Very practical! Recommend a product that diving outdoor enthusiasts can start with.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Used it at a shipwreck at 106 feet and it worked perfect and was brighter as expected. I did order the big rechargable batteries instead of using three AAA batteries..
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Good as a backup.
customer_reviews.text: The design is reliable, cheap, albeit cumbersome. For normal recreational depths, This light would be a nice cheap backup to your primary light. for $15 ($12 sometimes) it's effectively disposable to me. A Little difficult to turn on and off, but the twist cap won't fail unless you snap an o-ring or throw it at a rock. Really wish it had a better place for a bolt-snap though. Bright enough to get you out of most dark places on deeper rec/night dives. Obviously, it's not a cave light.
customer_reviews.author: reeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Poor control design
customer_reviews.text: Poor controls: on, off, mode switching done by partially unscrewing battery door. Hard to do on the first try, potentially prone to leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My son took this to a water park so the slides were not dark. It is so bright! It comes with a velcro strap to make sure you don't lose it.

customer_reviews.title: One-handed operation is very simple, very energy-saving, very bright, and good waterproof effect
customer_reviews.text: This diving torch is very practical and convenient to use. It has three working modes and has a wide range of applications. It functions like a floodlight, it cannot be focused, and it can be used in low light mode and high light mode in shallow water with full sunlight. In the flicker mode, LED is used for lighting, and the light of the diving light will be significantly brighter, and it is very energy-efficient. It is very dangerous to explore dark caves and dive without enough electricity. His charging design is very good, there is a fast charging USB interface, I like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Laura Garcia

customer_reviews.title: For a Scuba Diver, This is a Must-Have
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I bought this because it's a waterproof flashlight designed for extreme conditions i.e. floating on the surface is one thing, but needing to bring a light source under the water into high-pressure environments is quite another. I really like the velcro wrist wrap that makes it virtually impossible to lose your light. I would recommend this diving light for anyone.

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: I used this flashlight to look for leaks in my vinyl lined training pool. Functioned as I hoped it wood ,clear bright light while i squirted dye. Initial testing of light resulted in my wife waking me up at 1:30 am asking me why the new flashlight was in strobe function and lighting our bedroom from a patio table. Easy fix but the twist on/off /strobe switch had to be played with until correct setting . I had turned it off around 5:00pm after using it that day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diving light
customer_reviews.text: The structure of this lamp is very strong. The triple O-ring system ensures that the water tightness can work well. It is well-lit, suitable for diving or night snorkeling, and it is sufficient for most diving. It provides a good spotlight function and brings a brand new light to my diving. It is very simple to use, and it is easy to find and activate the switch. The price is very affordable, it is recommended to buy!
customer_reviews.author: April Colle

customer_reviews.title: Hard to believe a 5k lumen u/w video light for this price!
customer_reviews.text: So this is my very initial review, and will come back with more details following a liveaboard dive trip to put this thing through the ringer. But, 5000 lumens using top of the line LEDs for less than $100 is a ridiculous no brainer. Since Amazon doesn’t ship lithium batteries to where I live, had to pick up a four pack of 3500 mAh 18650 batteries at Fry’s on the way to the embarkation point. This thing is by far the most powerful dive light I have ever used. To be continued....

customer_reviews.title: The workmanship is good, very bright and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good, feel very good, very bright waterproof performance first-class, the light is very bright, irradiation far, lasting a long time, very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: TammyciaAnderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this diving flashlight is very good, the light is also very strong, very easy to use. I'm a scuba diver and I'll use it next time I go scuba diving!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love this flashlight, I ordered it for work we’re it’s in and out of water all the time and the flashlight has not fail me it’s working and allows me to see in dark places
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Great satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing with it for a while. The battery is durable, the switch is flexible, and it works. Finally, the most important thing is the brightness
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burpo

customer_reviews.title: Ok in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: Alright for a backup light. Dont pay extra money for the high powered battery, it isn't any brighter than the aaa batteries
customer_reviews.author: benjamin scherer

customer_reviews.title: It's good for light
customer_reviews.text: Flashlight spotlight very awesome for my husband to catch fish at night. This is really too professional, especially practical. It's sealed
customer_reviews.author: Sumaya Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights
customer_reviews.text: The diving lights are really good, good quality and heavy. With it, you can dive underwater to see the underwater world, which is really good!
customer_reviews.author: Armando H.

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: In less than clear water, the visibility of the light is pretty low.
customer_reviews.author: 'gate alum 85

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order
customer_reviews.text: Used one time. Water for inside and the flashlight was ruined
customer_reviews.author: Beth Doughty

customer_reviews.title: Is very nice
customer_reviews.text: Product material: Very good, Light intensity: Very strong Endurance: No use Product weight: take more easily
customer_reviews.author: Roland Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Mega bright flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy flashlight and really bright love it. But I still haven’t tried it underwater
customer_reviews.author: Tom Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Use ok
customer_reviews.text: The usage is ok. It was too bright compared to the previous shots
customer_reviews.author: fa52c94183

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great flashlight for the price, easy to use and really bright.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Took it to 35 meters and it works. Bright enough for its indicated lumens. Ideal as a backup light.
customer_reviews.author: Butch Canares

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: This is a good 1st or 2nd light for any SCUBA diver.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E.

customer_reviews.title: Seems Like a Good Light for The Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very basic light. You turn it on by screwing the end tighter and turn it off by unscrewing it a bit. I have not taken it on a dive yet, but it seems like it will work fine. If using the wrist strap, it's a little cumbersome trying to turn it on and off with one hand. That being said, for the money, I think it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: JFish

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Baby received the seller quickly delivery logistics is also very powerful customer service attitude is very good very patient give a person a kind of affinity good like exquisite packaging high end atmosphere and class I can see that the business is very careful baby really good.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah e lehnert

product_meta.title: BlueFire 1100 Lumen CREE XM-L2 Scuba Diving Flashlight Waterproof Diving Torch Submarine Diving Safety Lights Underwater Dive Light (Yellow)
feature_bullets: Updated CREE XM-L2 Led, super bright and more practical underwater.
Aluminum Alloy Head and Fluorescence ABS body Design, Waterproof IPX-8, up to underwater 80ft
3 Working Modes, two brightness levels, a strobe light.
Lanyard and Hand Strap included, conveniently carry and use underwater.
Uses a rechargeable 18650 Li-ion battery or three AAA batteries(Battery Not Included)
